actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow handicapped individuals a deduction for certain commuting expenses.

summary.text: Allows handicapped individuals a deduction from adjusted gross income under the Internal Revenue Code for expenses paid or incurred by such person in commuting to and from his principal place of employment.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow handicapped individuals a deduction for certain commuting expenses.
